comment.body: @Beelzebub: What the fuck is your problem?
I don't recall Discord brainwashing me?

I was considering buying a CHIP Pro the other day, but decided against it since the project I wanted it for could just be replaced with my Pi instead.  PocketCHIP, however, looks like a really nice way to play PICO games, and the only problem I would have with it would be the design... though I'm pretty sure I could fix that ;)

@sthetz: Probably, keyboard swiping isn't in iPhone, and she's on Mac so I'd say the chances are high.


Rooting isn't possible on the Amazon devices (see this: http://forum.xda-developers.com/moto-g4/how-to/how-to-root-g4-fix-bootable-attempted-t3417592) since the bootloader can't be unlocked - it's a shame, but I'd imagine someone will find their way around Amazon's lock sooner or later.
